errors.default: Something went wrong. Please try again later!

discordLogin.label: Login with Discord
discordLogin.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.

login.description: Username / Password is not the default login system for the Eternal Anvil. Please login using Discord.

form.gameWorld_required: You must select a game world where you're not already part of an account.
form.name: Account Name
form.name_required: The account name cannot be empty.

errors.multiAccount: You already have an account on this game world!

join.description: Join an existing account by pasting their Id here!

form.account_required: You must fill in the account Id that you want to join.

errors.multiAccount: You already have an account on the game world this account belongs to!

accountId.success: Account Id copied to your clipboard.

deleteAccount.label: Delete account
deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.message:
<0>This action is permanent.</0> You're about to leave this account and delete all it's data. The other players on this account will also forcibly leave it. Are you sure you want to delete this account?

Alternatively, you can give another player ownership and leave.

leaveAccount.label: Leave account
leaveAccount.title: Leave account
leaveAccount.message: You'll leave this account and game world. Are you sure you want to leave this account?

kick.label: Kick
kick.title: Are you sure you want to kick {{user}} from this account?
kick.message: This will remove their access to this account and it's realm.

makeOwner.label: Make Owner
makeOwner.title: Are you sure you want to make {{user}} the owner of this account?
makeOwner.message: You'll lose the ability to kick other users, or manage the realm this account has joined.

copyImage.error: An error occurred: failed to copy image to clipboard.

multiple.description: Select tabs to copy as image...
multiple.title: Screenshot title

0.description: Add to mission / Goblin Fort / Relic
0.name: No penalty

about.developer: This project was developed by {{developer}}.<0 />You can find my website <1>here</1>.<0 />Find me on Discord as <2>{{discord}}</2>.
about.openSource: This project is open source.<0 />For suggestions, contributions, and bug reports, please visit the project's <1 />.
about.title: The Eternal Anvil project
about.travianDisclaimer: Images and game elements belong to <0>Arkheim</0>.<1 />All their rights belong to <2>Travian Games GmbH</2>.<3 />Arkheim and Travian Games GmbH are not responsible for the contents on this website nor have any affiliation with it.

donations.content: If you wish to help with the website upkeep costs, or show appreciation for my work, you can leave a donation here!
donations.disclaimer: Donations are in no way required. Take care of yourself first.
donations.title: Thank you for using the Eternal Anvil!
